meanings.definition: A woman believed to possess the power of prophecy or divination.
meanings.sent1: The pythonesses in the ancient tales foretold the future with mysterious wisdom.
meanings.sent2: The village revered the pythonesses for their ability to see what others could not.
meanings.sent3: The pythonesses' predictions were so accurate that even the skeptics were left in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was like that of a pythoness, seeing through the veil of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The pythonesses' visions painted a vivid picture of what was yet to come.

meanings.sent1: Legends spoke of the pythonesses who guarded the sacred temple.
meanings.sent2: The group of pythonesses gathered to share their insights and visions.
meanings.sent3: The marketplace buzzed with rumors about the mysterious pythonesses in town.
meanings.sent4: Their unity was as strong as a bond between pythonesses, each supporting the other.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the pythonesses added an aura of mystique to the gathering.
